title: Software Engineering Technology
location: Dalian Maple Leaf College of Technology
content: This diploma program provides students with solid foundations in programming, databases, and software project management. Students will also gain hands-on experience through paid internships while studying.

title: Electrical Engineering & Automation
content: This program focuses on power systems, industrial automation, and robotics. Students will learn to design, maintain, and troubleshoot electrical systems with modern tools and techniques.

title: Mechanical Design & Automation
content: Students will develop skills in mechanical design, CAD, manufacturing, and industrial automation. The program emphasizes practical training for careers in global industries.

title: Information Technology
content: The IT program covers networking, cybersecurity, cloud computing, and data analytics. Students will be prepared for roles in global IT enterprises and startups.

title: Master of Business Administration
content: The MBA program equips students with leadership, financial analysis, and strategic management skills. The curriculum combines case studies and real-world projects.

title: Chinese Language Program
content: This program focuses on Mandarin language proficiency, cultural immersion, and practical communication skills. Flexible durations are available to fit student needs.
